Package htsjdk.tribble.readers

Interface Summary
LineIterator A very simple descriptor for line-iterables.
LineReader Interface for line-oriented readers.
Positional Minimal interface for an object at support getting the current position in the stream / writer / file, as well as a handful of other reader-like features.
TabixReader.Iterator  
 

Class Summary
AsciiLineReader A simple class that provides AsciiLineReader.readLine() functionality around a PositionalBufferedStream BufferedReader and its BufferedReader.readLine() method should be used in preference to this class (when the LocationAware functionality is not required) because it offers greater performance.
AsciiLineReaderIterator A class that iterates over the lines and line positions in an AsciiLineReader.
AsynchronousLineReader A LineReader implementation that delegates the work of reading and fetching lines to another thread.
LineIteratorImpl A simple iterator over the elements in LineReader.
LineReaderUtil A collection of factories for generating LineReaders.
LongLineBufferedReader A variant of BufferedReader with improved performance reading files with long lines.
PositionalBufferedStream A wrapper around an InputStream which performs it's own buffering, and keeps track of the position.
TabixIteratorLineReader  
TabixReader  
TabixReader.TIndex  
TabixReader.TPair64  
 

Enum Summary
LineReaderUtil.LineReaderOption
